summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick. It details the billing cycle, charges incurred, and payment information. The document also includes information about government fees, taxes, and various service charges. This document contains detailed voice usage records for an AT&T Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick. It includes a log of incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, and the associated charges, primarily during the month of November 2004. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for a phone account associated with Martin Golick, including incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, and the associated charges. The records span several days in December 2004, primarily focusing on calls made to and from locations in Florida. This document details the voice usage activity for the phone number associated with Martin Golick, including incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, and the locations from which the calls were made. It provides insight into the communication patterns and frequency of calls made to and from specific locations, particularly Palm Beach, Florida.

persons.name: Martin Golick
persons.context: Martin Golick is the account holder for the AT&T Wireless account detailed in the document, which includes billing information and service charges.
